rules.description: Left Cmd + Delete → Ctrl+U (delete terminal line)
Go to start of line left arrow - option
Go to start of line left arrow - control/cmd
Go to end of line right arrow - option
Go to end of line right arrow - control
[RELACON] Middle click: tap => Delete, double/hold => clear all
[RELACON] D-pad left: tap => Left, double => Chrome
[RELACON] D-pad right: tap => Right, double => Tower
[RELACON] D-pad up: tap => Up, double => Cursor
[RELACON] D-pad down: tap => Down, double => iTerm
[GLOBAL] Mouse 4 - Tap: Text to speech, Hold: Claude voice

manipulators.description: Global Jump to windows via script kit
Global Jump to windows via script kit
